page.title: 03TOURISM
page.content: TOURISM Frensham Big Pond is a main attraction because of its many kinds of nature.There is a sandy beach around the pond and people usually go there to play,and sit on the sand,or go paddling or swimming in the pond.You need to take care because the pond can go very deep and weedy in places. People from London frequently visit the pond to relax.The area round the pond has been made into a country park,and there is a car park,a ranger's office and a Red Cross Post there.There is an interesting walk round the pond;sometimes you see rare birds or their nests,and many different types of wild flowers,butterflies,and other insects.Some people do windsurfing or yachting on the pond.There is a hotel on the far side of the pond.
